module.author: tod-gentille
module.title: Positioning
module.description: This module will examine how Qt Quick achieves a fluid interface that both performs well and is easy to maintain. It starts with the basic but extremely important concept of Anchors. It then examines the basic positioners : Grid, Row and Column. It also explores their resizable counterparts GridLayout, RowLayout and ColumnLayout. The module finishes with a brief look at the Flow container.
